charges.charge_disposition: Date of imposition of judgment 2/20/98. The dft pleaded guilty to count 1. Count 2 is dismissed on the motion of the US. The dft is herby committed to the custody of the US Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 48 months. Upon release from imprisonment, the dft shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 years. Special Conditions of Supervision 1) Personally report to the PO w/in 72 hours of release. 2) Successfully participate in any substance abuse counseling program, which may include chemical or breathalyzer testing, as directed by the PO, and pay any associated costs, as directed by the PO 3) The dft shall submit his person, residence, office or vehicle to a search, conducted by a US Probation Officer at a reasonable time and in a reasonable manner, based upon reasonable suspicion of contraband or evidence of a violation of a condition of release; failure to submit to a search may be grounds for revocation; the dft shall warn any other residents that the premises may be subject to searches pursuant to this condition. 4) The dft shall not personally operate any motor vehicle until properly licensed to do so according to the law. 5) The dft shall not consume alcohol or cereal malt beverages during the term of supervised release. The dft shall pay the following total criminal monetary penalties, MSA in the amount of $50.00 for assessment. (1)
Dismissing count 2 on the motion of the US (2)
